item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > ThePhoenician > Tiny_Bastion_for_Imperial_Defenders [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/tiny-bastion-for-imperial-defenders

Id objet : tiny-bastion-for-imperial-defenders

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • epic decors IMP Batiments

Collections pour tags :

  • epic decors IMP Batiments NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

Quick remix of a free Bastion from VIRUSESOFDEATH ( https://cults3d.com/en/users/virusesofdeath/3d-models )

Scaled and made more printable for 6-8mm gaming.

NOTE: If you want to be able to fit a 25mm base on the roof, youll need to upscale the part by 15% ish in your slicer of choice.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > ThePhoenician > Galactic_Crusaders_Perfect_Sergeants [dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/galactic-crusaders-perfect-sergeants

Id objet : galactic-crusaders-perfect-sergeants

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • epic infanterie SMI SMC Sm-qg SM30K

Collections pour tags :

  • epic infanterie SMI SMC Sm-qg SM30K SUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

Another quick remix of MoonJammy's amazing Galactic Crusader range.

Come supported in the typical manner, and I have had several successful prints using these supports.

Wanted to add some legion specific flare to my tiny guys, and figured someone else may appreciate these.

Justification du tag SUP :

~~~
Come supported in the typical manner, and I have had several successful prints using these supports.

Collections pour tags :

Description :

1
2
3
4

Just a quick remix of MoonJammy's amazing 'GALACTIC CRUSADERS - ANTI ORGANIC HEAVY WEAPONS'
( https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/art/galactic-crusaders-anti-organic-heavy-weapons-6-8mm )

Wanted a few different poses for my tiny guys, and figured Id share the result.
